trans-unit.source: If you intended to perform the action on a global tool, use the `--global` option for the command.
trans-unit.target: 如果打算在全局工具上执行操作，请使用命令的 "--global" 选项。

trans-unit.source: Specifying the tool manifest option (--tool-manifest) is only valid with the local option (--local or the default).
trans-unit.target: 指定工具清单选项(--tool-manifest)仅对本地选项(--local 或默认值)有效。

trans-unit.source: Warning: There are other manifest files in the directory hierarchy that will affect this local tool. The following files have not been changed: {0}
trans-unit.target: 警告: 目录层次结构中存在其他将影响此本地工具的清单文件。未更改以下文件: {0}
